title: Support easier overrides of Carrot2 clustering attributes via XML data sets exported from the Workbench.

comments.author: Dawid Weiss
comments.content:
Todo: the example should come with the default Carrot2 algorithms preconfigured (by name) and with
sensible default attribute XMLs. The benefit is twofold - better out-of-the-box source for copy-pasting and a clear indication where overridden resources must be located.

We should provide the defaults for Lingo, STC and kmeans perhaps.

Another thing is that LEXICAL_RESOURCES_DIR no longer reflects the true purpose of that folder... perhaps it should be aliased to something more sensible.
